snippet: A wildfire in northern Idaho has destroyed at least six homes and forced about 300 residents in an upscale lakeside community to evacuate as it spread to more than three square miles on Monday.
abstract: Wildfire in northern Idaho destroys at least six homes and forces about 300 residents to evacuate area.
lead_paragraph: A wildfire in northern Idaho has destroyed at least six homes and forced about 300 residents in an upscale lakeside community to evacuate as it spread to more than three square miles on Monday.

headline.main: Idaho: 300 Are Evacuated as Wildfire Destroys Homes
headline.print_headline: Idaho: 300 Are Evacuated as Wildfire Destroys Homes
